enable_contact_links.label: Enable contact links

link_level_1.label: Link level 1
link_level_1.info: Enter level 1 link text in order to get the megamenu to show at that spot. Please note that this is case sensitive.

paragraph_filtering_and_sorting.content: Customize [filters](/admin/menus). You can find more information on filtering and sorting through [this link](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/storefront-filters)

api-key.label: Google Maps API Key
api-key.info: Embeds a map with the shop's address, pinned in the center. How to set up google api keys: https://support.google.com/googleapi/answer/6158862?hl=en

address.label: Address
address.info: Uses the shop address by default. Override it using this format: Street address,City Country/State

title.label: Block title
title.info: This field is for representational purpose only.

size_guide_page.label: Size guide page
size_guide_page.info: Should contain the size guide table contents

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Create advanced customization by adding an app snippet or other liquid code.

threshold.label: Threshold
threshold.info: Show notification, when selected variant inventory is equal or below the threshold

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

page.label: Page
page.info: Selecting page will overwrite the field above with the page content

header.info: Products are displayed based on the Shopify Recommendations API and Search & Discovery app. Read more [here](https://help.shopify.com/en//manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#complementary-products)

product_list.label: Products
product_list.info: Will be used if collection is not selected.

button_url_1.info: Defaults to the Blog URL, if chosen

blog.label: Blog
blog.info: Display articles from a Blog, instead of section blocks.

articles_count.label: Articles count
articles_count.info: Number of articles to be pulled from the Blog.

form_code.label: Newsletter form code
form_code.info: For embedded forms: Klaviyo, Mailchimp etc. Leave blank to use default one.

answer-page.label: Answer (Page)
answer-page.info: If selected it will overwrite the answer field

paragraph_background.content: For best results, use an image/video with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio).

disable_video_autoplay_on_mobile.label: Disable video autoplay on mobile
disable_video_autoplay_on_mobile.info: Recommended to be enabled to lower mobile data usage and increase performance on mobile devices. If checked the mobile image will be used.

description.label: Video description text

height.info: Affects desktop only. Please note if you use the medium preset and a 60-40 block you should be adding less content to the aside and aside bottom parts.

paragraph_aside_bottom.content: Please note, this will not show on mobile

flip.label: Flip
flip.info: Flip the order of Main and Aside blocks

image_crop.label: Image vertical position
image_crop.info: Will apply only if image height is less than selected section height.

video.label: Video
video.info: Video file path from Admin > Settings > Files. Recommended video aspect ratio - 16:9. File format - MP4

disable_video_autoplay_on_mobile.label: Disable video autoplay on mobile
disable_video_autoplay_on_mobile.info: Recommended to be enabled to lower mobile data usage and increase performance on mobile devices. If checked the mobile image will be used.

image_crop.label: Image vertical position
image_crop.info: Will apply only if image height is less than selected section height.

paragraph_card_settings.content: Will overwrite collection values if collection is set.

marquee_position.label: Position
marquee_position.info: Please note this only applies when images are added.

show_privacy_note.label: Show privacy note
show_privacy_note.info: Requires a Privacy page. More info [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/checkout-settings/refund-privacy-tos).

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

paragraph_boxed_items.content: This includes quantity widget, variant radio buttons, pagination buttons, stock progress bar and form inputs

paragraph_info.content: Bellow settings apply for colletion and article cards.

enable_localization.label: Enable localization
enable_localization.info: Once this is enabled you can show the localization selector in the announcement bar or the footer.

header.info: Checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

enable_cart_shipping_bar.label: Enable
enable_cart_shipping_bar.info: Text fields must not be blank and threshold must be greater than zero

cart_shipping_bar_progress_text.label: Progress text
cart_shipping_bar_progress_text.info: Use [amount] to print the remaining amount needed for free shipping

cart_shipping_bar_empty_text.label: Empty text
cart_shipping_bar_empty_text.info: Use [amount] to print the set threshold price.

cart_upsell_product_list.label: Products, when cart has items
cart_upsell_product_list.info: Overwritten, if recommendations API is used

cart_upsell_use_recommendations_api.label: Use recommendations API
cart_upsell_use_recommendations_api.info: Products are displayed based on the Shopify Recommendations API and Search & Discovery app. Read more [here](https://help.shopify.com/en//manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

additional_checkout_buttons.label: Show additional checkout buttons
additional_checkout_buttons.info: Please be aware that third-party apps could disable these buttons. Read more [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout/compatibility).

enable_terms.label: Show terms
enable_terms.info: Shows checkbox to accept terms and conditions, before proceed to checkout. More info [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/checkout-settings/refund-privacy-tos).

wrap_product.label: Wrap product
wrap_product.info: Show checkbox for order wrapping option. Requires a non-sold out product, with only default variant(no product options). If there are multiple product variants, the first available variant will be added. The product should NOT be marked as physical product and should NOT have inventory tracking enabled.

product_created_days_offset.label: NEW Badge days
product_created_days_offset.info: It determines either to show or not the 'New' product badge.

card_product_swap_image_on_hover.label: Swap image on hover
card_product_swap_image_on_hover.info: Show second product image when product card media is hovered

enable_images_filtering.label: Filter images
enable_images_filtering.info: Filters product images, based on the theme settings color option name and images SEO text(alt text), which must follow the following pattern: SEO Text|{option_name}:{option_value}. For example: `Great T-Shirt - Front|color:Gray`. You can find more information [here](https://bigstart.gitbook.io/marble-documentation/global-settings/product#filter-images)

card_product_image_alignment.label: Image alignment
card_product_image_alignment.info: Does not apply when the media size is set to Original.

swatches_option.label: Swatches option name
swatches_option.info: The option name, which will hold the swatch colors. E.g.: `Color`, `Colour`, `Material`, etc...

swatches_hex_codes.label: Hex/Swatch image codes
swatches_hex_codes.info: Pair of color name and value formatted like <Color>=<HEX Color/Swatch image>. Examples: Red=#ff0000, Yellow=yellow.png. The color name must match the variant color option name. Upload swatch images from your store's [files](/admin/settings/files). Each custom color should be on a new line.  [Learn more about color swatches](https://bigstart.gitbook.io/marble-documentation/global-settings/swatches)

swatches_size_option.label: Size option name
swatches_size_option.info: The option name for sizes. It is used to trigger the buttons selection type and size guide on product sections.
